name: Grow a Beard
description:
My name is Handsome Dave and I'll be your personal trainer to guide you through steps to get a manly beard.

TIME TO GROW A BEARD!

Handsome Dave will push you to your limit in these fast paced mini-games.
We had quite a laugh doing this, we hope you will have fun playing it too!

Note: Images are less pixelated if you use the "Web Desktop" link instead of the embedded version.

CREDITS:

All sounds effects in VoiceActing3000.
Animations in GhettoVision xHD.
No rabbits were hurt making this game.
We do not promote excessive alcohol consumption.
Please do not high-five random wild animals.
All the virtual meat in this game was produced organically.
Made in France.
Mime content guarantied < 0.27%.

Martin Denizet
Graphics / Voice acting
